flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in writing speed is 10 words/minute - 7 words/minute = <<10-7=4>>4 words/minute
Matt can write 4 words/minute x 5 minutes = <<4*5=20>>20 more words with his right hand.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3, not 4. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
